title: The Writer's Almanac for Wednesday, December 15, 2021
description: 230 years ago the Bill of Rights was ratified by the United States of America. These powerful statements were spearheaded by James Madison, later the 4th president of the United States.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: 230 years ago the Bill of Rights was ratified by the United States of America. These powerful statements were spearheaded by James Madison, later the 4th president of the United States.
